jp_text: 俺を置いて行ってくれ…｡
あのな…そう心配するな バディ｡

en_text: Let's all pray that they're safe.
jp_text: ２人の無事をみんなで祈ろう｡
google_translated: Let's pray for all two people.

jp_text: これを使ってしまったら…》

en_text: I don't have time to think.
But I don't want that to happen...
jp_text: でも…そうなったらヤダなあ⦆
帰ってきたぞ ダミアン｡

en_text: he'll be boiled alive in his suit.
jp_text: 熱湯を ぶっかけるようなもんだ》
google_translated: I'm going to get hot water

jp_text: ヒューストン こちら日々人｡

en_text: Roger that! We're on our way!
jp_text: 了解した｡すぐに向かう！➡
google_translated: I understand. I will go soon!➡

jp_text: どこへ 行くんだ…ヒビト｡

en_text: Taking a walk on the moon by myself.
jp_text: 月面を ひとりで散歩｡

en_text: Hibito's down to three minutes of oxygen.
Perhaps if there were a way to communicate.
jp_text: ＜通話ができるなら ともかく➡

en_text: Damn it! We're not gonna make it in time!
jp_text: ＜クソッ 絶対に間に合わねえ！➡
